text: orkkuka: allahu ceadikkunna sandarbham: "maryaminre makan isa! “allahuvekkutate enneyum enre matavineyum aradhyarakkuvin” enn niyanea janannaleat parannat?” appeal addeham parayum: "ni etra parisud'dhan! enikku parayan patillatta oru karyam nan parayavatallallea. nan annane parannirunnenkil urappayum ni atarinnirikkum. enre manas'silullat ni ariyum. ennal ninre ullilullat nanariyukayilla. tirccayayum ni tanneyan kannukeant kanan kaliyattatupealum nannayariyunnavan
